mapper.select: select count(*) FROM contract WHERE business_num NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT business_num FROM workorder)

SELECT business_num, item_name, contract_qty, business_name, date_format(business_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as business_date, date_format(out_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as out_date FROM contract WHERE business_num NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT business_num FROM workorder) order by business_num limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select business_num, item_name, contract_qty, business_name, date_format(business_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as business_date, date_format(out_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as out_date from contract where business_num = #{keyword}

select c.business_num, r.item_num as ritem_num, c.item_num, r.item_name as r_name, c.contract_qty, r.r_name as item_name, round(c.contract_qty*r.r_qty/p.weight) as wo_qty from recipe r, contract c, products p where r.r_name=c.item_name and r.item_name=p.item_name and business_num=#{num}

select w.wo_num, c.business_num, date_format(w.wo_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as wo_date, r.item_num as ritem_num, c.item_num, r.item_name as r_name, c.contract_qty, r.r_name as item_name, round(c.contract_qty*r.r_qty/p.weight) as wo_qty, w.manu_name, (case when sum(p2.manu_tocount) < w.wo_qty then "진행중" when sum(p2.manu_tocount) = w.wo_qty then "완료" end) as wo_state from recipe r join contract c on r.r_name = c.item_name join products p on r.item_name = p.item_name join workorder w on c.business_num=w.business_num left outer join productstatus p2 on p2.wo_num=w.wo_num where r.r_name=w.item_name and w.wo_num=#{num} group by w.wo_num, c.business_num, r.item_num, c.item_num, r.item_name, c.contract_qty
mapper.insert: insert into workorder(wo_num, business_num, wo_date, wo_qty, manu_name, item_name, wo_emp, wo_available) values(concat("WO",date_format(now(), "%y%m%d%H%i%s")), #{business_num}, now(), #{contract_qty}, #{manu_name}, #{item_name}, #{wo_emp}, 1)

insert into workorder_item select w.wo_num, r.item_name as item_name, round(r.r_qty/p.weight*c.contract_qty) as wo_qty from recipe r, contract c, products p, workorder w where r.r_name= c.item_name and w.business_num = c.business_num and r.item_name = p.item_name and w.business_num=#{business_num}
mapper.update: update workorder set wo_available=0 where wo_num = #{wo_num}
update workorder set manu_name= #{manu_name} where wo_num= #{wo_num}
